code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as Main
    participant MM as MindMap
    participant LE as LLMExploration
    participant LS as LanguageSupport
    participant OD as OntologyDatabase
    M->>MM: render_map(FinTech_Gate)
    M->>LE: explore(FinTech_Node)
    LE-->>M: return exploration_data
    M->>LE: generate_summary(FinTech_Risk)
    LE-->>M: return summary
    M->>LE: generate_flashcards(FinTech_Node)
    LE-->>M: return flashcards
    M->>LS: translate(FinTech_Ledger)
    LS-->>M: return translated_text
    M->>LS: detect_language(FinTech_Node)
    LS-->>M: return language
    M->>OD: save_ontology(FinTech_Ledger)
    OD-->>M: None
    M->>OD: load_ontology(FinTech_Vault)
    OD-->>M: return concepts
